title: [Large-scale] Science Online Course Design Based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Foundational Knowledge in Scientific Disciplines
context.additional_context: An online educational environment for strengthening science-related job competencies. Includes digital device provision, formative assessment focus, and flexible learning schedules.

learning_goals: Learners can design science content considering diverse learning styles by applying UID principles
Learners can develop and evaluate three or more flexible task formats
Learners implement two or more structured instructional strategies to enhance cognitive accessibility in online learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
